citation: Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Amendment Act 2015 (Tas)
text:
Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Amendment Act 2015

An Act to amend the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Act 2013 and the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Regulations 2014 and for related purposes
[Royal Assent 27 November 2015]

Be it enacted by Her Excellency the Governor of Tasmania, by and with the advice and consent of the Legislative Council and House of Assembly, in Parliament assembled, as follows:

PART 1 - Preliminary

1. Short title
    This Act may be cited as the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Amendment Act 2015 .

2. Commencement
        (1) Except as provided in this section, this Act commences on the day on which this Act receives the Royal Assent.
        (2) Part 4 commences on 1 December 2015.
        (3) Part 3 commences on 1 April 2016.

PART 2 - Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Act 2013 Amended

3.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Act 2013 .

PART 3 - Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Act 2013 Amended

37. Principal Act
    In this Part, the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Act 2013 is referred to as the Principal Act.

38.
    The amendments effected by this section have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Act 2013 .

    The amendment effected by this section has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Act 2013 .

40.
    The amendment effected by this section has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Act 2013 .

PART 4 - Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Regulations 2014 Amended

41. Principal Regulations
    In this Part, the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Regulations 2014 are referred to as the Principal Regulations.

42.
    The amendment effected by this section has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Regulations 2014 .

PART 5 - Miscellaneous

43. Amendment of regulations does not bar further amendment or repeal
    The amendment by this Act of any regulations does not bar their subsequent amendment or repeal by regulation.
